column4: cat /proc/cpuinfo should give some hints in the "flags" field
not sure what flag you're looking for though, just an idea.
dj-fu: yes, which flags? one would suspect VT but there is none. I know one of my machines supports it. Just don't know which one.
dj-fu: do you guys know, is there a way to get the exact CPU name somehow? t5500 ...
